snippet.title: Alien: Isolation – Coming to iOS and Android on December 16
snippet.description:
Pre-order on the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/alien-isolation/id1573029040

Fifteen years after the unsolved disappearance of her mother, Amanda Ripley boards the damaged and isolated Sevastopol space station in search of answers. She enters an out-of-control environment that offers no answers, but harbours a terrible secret…

This is the complete Alien: Isolation experience, bringing its stunning AAA visuals and every moment of hair-raising, heart-pounding horror to phones and tablets – complete with a fully customisable touch interface, controller support and all seven DLC packs.

Face the horror that lurks in Sevastopol space station in Alien: Isolation, arriving on iOS/Android on December 16th for $14.99 / €14.99 / £12.99.

Like us on Facebook:

#AlienIsolation #MobileGaming #Gaming
